entry.title: $2650 // True 1 Bed @226 West 16 St - Exposed Brick, Large Lvg Area, Dishwasher
entry.content:
Now listed for March: this is a renovated extra large true 1 bedroom apartment at 226 West 16th Street between 7th and 8th Avenue. Prime central Chelsea location, just steps from West Village, Greenwich Village, Union Square, Flatiron, and Meatpacking District.

Features include a new stainless steel & granite kitchen with gas range, microwave & dishwasher, large bedroom with enough space for a queen sized bed plus additional furniture, windows & closet space throughout, exposed brick, hardwood floors, view overlooking West 16th Street, high loft-like ceilings, large living area, and a fully upgraded marble-tiled bathroom.

Pet friendly! This apartment is only available courtesy of Preston NY, a broker fee applies. Guarantors accepted. Viewings and open houses are by appointment only.

Please contact Alex with any questions or to set up a showing.
617-823-3924
acollicott@prestonny.com

OPEN HOUSE
Sunday January 20th
Please RSVP for details!
